title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed stating that the changes need to be saved. The issue is that it is not clear to the user how to save the changes or discard them. Additionally, the dialog box is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing XML in the 'source' view and trying to switch to the Layout view, an error message is displayed stating 'Source page is dirty.'
EB: When editing XML in the 'source' view and trying to switch to the Layout view, a clear and informative error message should be displayed which prompts the user to either save or discard the changes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Open the XML Report Designer in the Layout Editor.
2. Edit the XML in the 'source' view.
3. Try to switch to the Layout view.

Expected behavior:

A clear and informative error message should be displayed, prompting the user to either save or discard the changes.
